channel.title: Adding start up menu/menus
channel.description:
Sup, could someone please help me with the following
1)add a command that opens up a menu & also making a menu s it can be activited by a command
2)Add a start up menu, so when you logg in you a get a purplish screen, which makes you unable to move, but on the purpilish screen theres like latest updates, and stuff And in the centre it says Server Created by: (name)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Need help with num 2 especially [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2008, 03:46:48 PM[/size][hr]and can you please send what to do with like (text here) ect ect cso some guy just tried to heklp and make me mess up my server
